amendment.description: An amendment numbered 83 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds by the Labor Department to finalize, implement, or enforce proposed amendments to class prohibited transaction exemptions available to investment advice fiduciaries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
